A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fantastic gripping film that keeps you engaged the entire time. I even went into it thinking I would genuinely hate the porgs... because seriously.. do we really need to add them to the film just so Disney can sell more plush toys to kids? I can admit when I was wrong\, they definitely add to the overall experience in a positive way. Great writing\, and a great cast. Overall worth every dollar\, and worth every moment of my life I have to watch it. I'm quite sure to watch it again.
